bill.summary:
Political Appointee Burrowing Prevention Act
This bill prohibits an individual employed in a political position in the civil service from being appointed to a career position in the civil service for two years after the individual separates from such political position.
Such prohibition shall not apply to a political appointee who has not personally and substantially participated in any particular matter while employed in a political position.
